TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that user is able to clear an applied query.
TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Click on Reset Query Button.Capture screenshot
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click on reset query button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on reset query button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on reset query button.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click Yes button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click Yes button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click Yes button.

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Verify Query applied has been cleared.Capture screenshot.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to verify that query applied has been cleared.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to verify that query applied has been cleared.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to verify that query applied has been cleared.
